long_description: Kids love to explore the great outdoors, so send them off on their adventures with the boys' Wallaroo Jackson Hat. UPF 50+ fabric and 3.25 in. brim help protect your little adventurer from too much sun. Supersoft, quick-dry fabric won't scratch or itch. Mesh crown for ventilation. 55cm (21.65 in.) hat circumference. Wallaroo Jackson Hat is 100% microfiber and ventilated mesh; hand wash with cold water.
short_description: Kids love to explore the great outdoors, so send them off on their adventures with the boys' Wallaroo Jackson Hat.
